home.title: MadAssistant
home.description: In emergency situations, every second counts. However, many people don't always know where to quickly find emergency numbers or essential information.

about.title: What is MadAssistant?
about.description: MadAssistant is a website designed to centralize and facilitate access to emergency numbers and contacts in Madagascar.
about.detailedDescription: It is designed to be simple to use, accessible even with a low internet connection, and compatible with all devices.

objectives.accessibility: Make emergency numbers more accessible, especially in remote areas.
objectives.reactionTime: Reduce reaction time through a clear and fast interface.
objectives.solution: Provide a free, modern solution adapted to the local context.
objectives.awareness: Raise public awareness of some still unknown services.

target.professionals: Health and security professionals for quick access to useful contacts.
target.organizations: Administrations and NGOs to coordinate their interventions.

doctor.title: Doctor
doctor.description: Quickly find a doctor near you for your medical consultations

police.title: Police
police.description: Contact law enforcement in case of emergency or to report an incident

hospital.title: Hospital
hospital.description: Access hospital services and emergency care centers
